items.sentence: I\'ve been complaining about that, but nothing has changed.

Tom got paint on his shirt while he was painting the fence.

Tom has been playing the violin for more than thirty years.
Tom has decided to live in Boston for the rest of his life.

The main problem with Tom is that he has no sense of humor.
